channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 7/17/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added support for sending WhatsApp HSM campaigns with titles and multimedia files (images, documents, videos) Added mobile call settings for making and receiving calls Added a Skills page to create and assign skill groups Added user status overview in the member settings page Improved mobile interface for workspace browsing Fixed issue during WhatsApp binding 7/10/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added support for attaching images, documents, videos, and titles in WhatsApp campaigns.
